message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $60, you get $40.
Your turn Alice. How about a more even split this time? Time is money!
I need a better deal than that, Bob. Time may be money, but it's not worth as much as you think. I'll take $65, you take $35.
Alice, let's be real. This is taking too long.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
